intro: Psychotria ladronica, commonly known as the "Ladronica Psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understory of rainforests. Psychotria ladronica is also noted for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
